about_the_game:
Depths of Hell is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Hell Demon Strikes Back
  • Hell's Kitchen
  • Molten Nightmare

Ambience
  • Dark Abyss
  • Eternal Suffering

SFX
  • Shackle Stomp (4)
  • Demon King Battle Yell (4)
  • Demon King Sword Hit (4)
  • Demon King Sword Miss (4)
  • Horror Paint Scream (4)
  • Horror Summon Big (4)
  • Horror Summon Medium (4)
  • Horror Summon Small (4)

  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
